places_with_reviews.name: The River Park Resort

reviews.text:
The location and ambience is awesome.  During our stay of 4 days, we stayed in  all the rooms. Some rooms, the lock doesn't work. Geyser does not work. Complaints made at the reception never heard of. Coming to Cave Rooms, from outside, they look good. But, not inside. Cave Rooms as said to be the expensive rooms are not provided with kettle, in spite of repeated requests.

Food for one day stay is ok

It was good experience food, location, geyser facility,surroundings are good.. but security is questionable. Its easier to open the locked cave room even from outside and normal rooms donot have extra lock facility from inside. Anyone with extra spare key can enter.

Worst resort i have ever seen and visited the management is very bad even the footpath is so clean then the resort swimming pool is not clean at all and staff members don't have any manners and behaviour is too bad don't ever go to this resort saanvi resort is far more better.. resort is good but staff members and resturant and far others things is not good

An excellent option to hangout with your friends and family.
Delicious food served in restaurant. Awesome view of Indravati rever bank.
Overall a good deal for residents & tourists of Bastar.

The staff seemed unprofessional, lacking manners and knowledge. The rooms don’t have proper facilities like towel, Mirror & land line. The most pathetic was their billing process was unclear, resulting in surprise charges post-checkout. The slow service and delayed billing made for a rather frustrating stay. I specially recommend not to opt for this property at any circumstances.

places_with_reviews.name: Bajaj's Karwan Inn
address: Chitrakote Rd, Jagdalpur, Dharmaur, Chhattisgarh 494442, India

reviews.text: I had an excellent experience at this hotel! The staff's politeness and helpfulness truly stood out, making my stay enjoyable. The food was delicious, exceeding my expectations, and the overall ambience created a pleasant atmosphere. Everything about this hotel was top-notch, and I highly recommend it for a fantastic stay.
Staff is good and fast in service. Place is quiet and cozy. Food is tasty. Rooms are clean and hygienic. Ambience is superb of both hotel and restaurant. Totally recommended for stay.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at, Bajaj's Karwan Inn. This charming hotel nestled in the heart of nature, and it truly exceeded all my expectations. The location is simply beautiful, surrounded by lush greenery and offering a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

The services provided were top-notch, with the staff going above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay. They were not only friendly but also incredibly helpful, offering excellent recommendations for local attractions and ensuring all our needs were met promptly.

But what truly stood out for me was the food. The hotel's restaurant served up some of the most amazing dishes I've ever had. From delicious breakfasts to delectable dinners, every meal was a culinary delight.

And for pet lovers like me, the fact that this hotel is pet-friendly was a huge plus. My furry friend had a blast exploring the nearby trails and parks.

In terms of location, this hotel is strategically situated close to all the major tourist spots, making it the perfect base for exploring the area. I can't recommend this place enough – it's a little slice of paradise in the midst of nature.
Couldn't expect any better than this at a reasonable rate. Service I receive there was exceptional. I made good relations with staff. It's a friendly, into the nature and cozy place to stay at.
Best place to stay when u r visiting Chitrakote waterfalls. Excellent service, clean rooms, Parking and Tasty food:-)

places_with_reviews.name: Naman Bastar

reviews.text:
Service Quality: The resort's service is impeccable, with staff always ready to assist promptly and efficiently.

Staff Behavior: The staff's behavior is exemplary, characterized by warmth, courtesy, and a traditional hospitality that adds a personal touch to the experience.

Resort Ambience: The ambience of the resort is enchanting, boasting picturesque surroundings and well-maintained facilities that create a serene and inviting atmosphere.

Lush Greenery: The resort is nestled amidst lush greenery, offering a tranquil retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. The verdant surroundings enhance the overall appeal of the resort.

Peaceful Atmosphere: The resort exudes a peaceful atmosphere, providing guests with a sanctuary to unwind and rejuvenate. Whether lounging by the pool or strolling through the gardens, tranquility permeates every corner of the property.

Overall, the resort delivers an exceptional experience characterized by top-notch service, genuine hospitality, captivating ambience, lush surroundings, and a peaceful atmosphere that leaves guests feeling refreshed.

1. No electric geyser in rooms. Only solar heater so forget luke warm water before 11 am in chilled winter.No hot water at night also.
2. No electric kettle at room for heating water for drinking/tea making.
3.Want tea before 7 am? Forget as kitchen is closed.
4.No body lotion/shampoo/dental kit provided in this luxurious resort.
5.Towel is very dirty and soiled.
6.So much salt in all food. Only deep fried starters are available.
No evening snacks availability.

Nice comfortable property for 2-3 days stay in Bastar... Good hospitality by staff with wonderful location. Good parking space, WiFi coverage, lots of greenery within premises, tasty food.
Little expensive regard to room charges.
Overall good experience.

It's been an amazing experience, the staff, the food and the location is literally top notch... I'll highly recommend to come and have a safe space to chill with your friends....
And the staff were so polite especially Sushmita, Phoolmati, Demaati, Bhuvneshwari, Fugno were so helping, answered all my queries politely....
Hygiene was top notch
In single words - phenomenal... ❤️
Very cooperative staff. Neat and clean room. Nice hospitality with delicious food value for money.
